column5: im looking for a good quality musky rod, that is 2 piece...id like it to be 7'6" minimum...but prefer 8ft heavy action....BP selection is pretty limited.  any suggestions?

Did you check the sales subform, saw great deals on muskie rods but can't remember if they were 2pc or 1pc.  btw you got that pm I sent you about Toronto islands right? I can't tell if mail is working 100%.
there aren't too many 2 pc muskie rods on the market  however, okuma does make a telescopic rod.  evx is the series of the rods.
I don't know if BPS still has them but get yourself an 8'6" Maina rod.
I've got the daiwa 2 piece...but its only 6'6".  Rapala makes one but I haven't seen it in stores.
